patthana20.9:1.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana20.9:2.1_0: Naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.9:3.1_0: Nasaraṇañca naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.9:4.1_1: ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana20.9:5.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana20.9:5.1_1: Naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.9:6.1_1: naadhipatiyā pañca …pe… napurejāte cattāri …pe… nakamme dve …pe… naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṁ …pe… navippayutte dve …pe… novigate tīṇi.
patthana20.9:8.1_0: Nasaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:9.1_0: Naaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:9.1_1: Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:9.1_2: Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:10.1_0: Nasaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:10.1_1: Nasaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana20.9:11.1_0: Naaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:11.1_1: Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.9:12.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca,
patthana20.9:12.1_1: anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri,
patthana20.9:12.1_2: purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ,
patthana20.9:12.1_3: āhāre indriye jhāne magge cattāri, sampayutte dve,
patthana20.9:13.1_0: Nasaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo, purejātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.9:14.1_1: naārammaṇe satta …pe… nasahajāte naaññamaññe nanissaye pañca …pe… napurejāte cha …pe… nasampayutte pañca,
patthana20.9:15.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
